channel.title: Feel pretty uncomfortable hosting my server after vault's server =/
channel.description:
I'm 18 now, fresh to go to jail and get raped in all my holes....
I love hosting Private servers, but this thing kinda stressed me out, i always felt untouchable from Jagex. It seems they can sue any one of us in the status list....

item.title: Feel pretty uncomfortable hosting my server after vault's server =/
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:

@Cole
@Acorn

Is that why your 2 dads made you 2 gaybies??

item.source: Feel pretty uncomfortable hosting my server after vault's server =/

item.title: Feel pretty uncomfortable hosting my server after vault's server =/
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:15, topic:477502”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=595696.msg4194360#msg4194360 date=1357289633]

On the other hand, you’re acting like Jagex WANTS to sue. I don’t think they’d enjoy ruining a kids financial life just because he hosted a server. When serious amounts of money come into play it does cause financial damages for Jagex (Snelmans), and then you’re at a huge risk.

20 people playing an unbalanced glitchy server is hardly a target for them.

So explain how some of the big servers like SS and NR have been up for a very long time, have made IRL bank from Jagex’s product, and haven’t been sued and / or taken down.
[/quote][/quote]
Never heard of these “big” servers. And they may have made an effort to live and host where they can hide from Jagex.

Acorn_:

Vault was not sued, and he was not shut down by jagex.

Yes he was. Didn’t you see the forum post by a jmod that said happy and legal new year? And then a list of the two first letters of every developers name? I’ve also seen the emails but we won’t get into that.

Vault made out with ~$70k. I wouldn’t give it back either. It was donated by people who don’t understand the law and thought it was possible.

Read full topic

I heard something abou that jagex pay people to shut down a server.

You really believe that?
Why would They pay if They can do it without paying?..
[/quote]
More like why would they pay when they can make money off of it[/quote]

Read full topic

On the other hand, you’re acting like Jagex WANTS to sue. I don’t think they’d enjoy ruining a kids financial life just because he hosted a server. When serious amounts of money come into play it does cause financial damages for Jagex (Snelmans), and then you’re at a huge risk.

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Host it and when Jagex warns you just tell them that you are hosting under my name then they wont fuck with you again

[quote=“Acorn_, post:8, topic:477502”]Vault was not sued, and he was not shut down by jagex. He willingly shutdown, and took off with the money.
He was only warned by jamflex[/quote]
This, and I’m not surprised he did this, he did it before with his other server, which was either 05scape or 07 scape.
